alert.note: Alert for Niobrara (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 5:02PM MDT until April 22 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NIOBRARA COUNTY... At 501 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manville, or 10 miles northwest of Lusk, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. Around 455 PM MDT quarter sized hail was reported on Highway 20 near Manville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Manville and Lance Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
